Posts.Content: tayreb wrote:   Hi all of you WONDERFUL CARING people.well my wait is over.nothing to worry about, easy to say now!!! all I have to do is go regularily for mammos so they can keep an eye on this benign mass...to make sure nothing chances.although according to my doc.thats about a 1% chance of happening.     Feeling much better today and have decided that it scared me enough to try to quit smoking, so thats my next endevour....    Thank you so very much for all of your love and support.I will be back on occasionally to check on you all and offer my love and support..                                               God Bless you all    love Tayreb     xoxo Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: brnign and thanking everyone tayreb patoo

Posts.Content: May 5, 2009 07:48PM tayreb wrote:  thanks everyone !!!!!    Barbe did you get the results you were waiting for< you in particular have been on my mind so much lately....please reply           love tayreb
Posts.Title: brnign and thanking everyone tayreb patoo

Posts.Content: May 5, 2009 11:28PM tayreb wrote:  I have not quit yet.......on thursday when I saw my doctor....I asked him to give me something to help me  to quit but I had to wait until I was back up north to get the prescription filled, (wellbutrin) I will do that tomorrow. My cousin and his wife both took that and quit over 3 years ago..I also have the book by Allen Carr titled" Easy way to stop smoking.".I know a woman that quit after reading it...between the pills and the book I am heading in the right direction, so I bought my last (carton) yesterday...normally I would have bought 5 for the month..but I will pat myself on the back...I only bought 1 !!!!! so within a week I will have finished the book, been on the pills for a few days.....and smoked the carton.....then I will (with Gods blessing) QUIT.      Please wish me luck....I am not a very strong willed person..... but I want to try.       P.S. I will pray for good results for you my friend, and be checking in on you after the 13th                                           . love Tayreb
Posts.Title: brnign and thanking everyone tayreb patoo
